text: The women's team foil competition at the 2014 Asian Games in Goyang was held on 24 September at the Goyang Gymnasium. ==Schedule== All times are Korea Standard Time (UTC+09:00) {|class = "wikitable" style="text-align:center;" ! width=220|Date ! width=50|Time ! width=150|Event |- | rowspan=3|Wednesday, 24 September 2014 || 09:00 || Quarterfinals |- | 10:30 || Semifinals |- | 18:00 || bgcolor=ffffcc|Gold medal match |} ==Seeding== The teams were seeded taking into account the results achieved by competitors representing each team in the individual event. {| class=wikitable style="text-align:center" !rowspan=2 width=40|Rank !rowspan=2 width=250|Team !colspan=2|Fencer !rowspan=2 width=40|Total |- !width=40|1 !width=40|2 |- |1||align=left| ||1||3||4 |- |2||align=left| ||3||5||8 |- |3||align=left| ||2||11||13 |- |4||align=left| ||6||10||16 |- |5||align=left| ||7||12||19 |- |6||align=left| ||13||17||30 |- |7||align=left| ||15||16||31 |} ==Results== ==Final standing== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" !width=40|Rank !width=250|Team |- | |align=left| Jeon Hee-sook Kim Mi-na Nam Hyun-hee Oh Ha-na |- | |align=left| Chen Bingbing Le Huilin Liu Yongshi Wang Chen |- | |align=left| Karin Miyawaki Shiho Nishioka Haruka Yanaoka |- | |align=left| Cheng Hiu Lam Kimberley Cheung Lin Po Heung Liu Yan Wai |- |5||align=left| Wang Wenying Cheryl Wong Nicole Wong Liane Wong |- |6||align=left| Ho Ka U Ho Peng I Huang Liya |- |7||align=left| Fatima Al-Mannai Shikha Al-Mannai Ghareeba Hammad Lolwa Ali Hassan |} ==References== *Women's Team Foil Results ==External links== *Official website Women foil
title: Fencing at the 2014 Asian Games – Women's team foil
